name: Lulu, The monster that's afraid of light
name_original: Lulu, The monster that's afraid of light
description:
Short game where you help a small monster lulu get to bed , she is afraid of the lights so help her by turning off the lights

Made with UE4 for the Kindred Game jam
All assets made by Dabt0402
Its my first platformer and first 3d platformer I've done
